friendCodes.headline: Share your runs
friendCodes.content-yourCode: Share your runs by exchanging friend codes!
friendCodes.content-friendCode: Enter a friend code to see which runs your friend has set up!
friendCodes.note-friendCode: Your friend's runs will be highlighted, but you'll continue to only receive notifications for runs you set up yourself.

settings.headline: Settings
settings.description-eventAnnouncements: Receive push notifications when the initial schedule for a new GDQ event is announced
settings.info-eventAnnouncements: To also receive a push notification when the new event starts, you need to set a reminder for the pre-show in the schedule after it's announced.
settings.description-eventUpdates: Receive push notifications when a new run is added to an event
settings.info-eventUpdates: To also receive a push notification when the new run starts, you need to set a reminder for it, after it's announced.
